name: Parth Shah
intro: I am Parth Shah, a Software Engineer at Amazon with a B.S. in Computer Science and Engineering from UC Davis. I'm currently working on Amazon's catalog contribution ingestion pipeline and have experience with GenAI listing tools. I've also contributed to projects like gem5 Vision, QuixFolio, and Stadia Wireless, showcasing my skills in web development, mobile app development, and cloud technologies.
